name: Professional Thief (itch)
description:
This Game needs to be Played in full Screen

You play as a professional thief who is an expert at robbing mansions to high-security bank vaults.

1. Your primary objective is to steal a valuable gadget and you can also steal cash, silver, and gold coins from the safes on your way.

2. You can use gadgets after stealing them in the game. These gadgets use batteries that can be obtained from the safe.

Controls:-

1. W A S D to move and E to interact with other objects.

2. Space to use gadgets and R to recharge them using batteries
